CONTACT


London based postgraduate, researching multi-agent swarms for debate and task automation.


(b. may 2002, Bath, England)

  • pursued physics, art, and design 2011-2018 for a love of science fiction
  • exposed to startups at L39, studied economics for a love of the macro, maths and Ben Graham
  • building artificial intelligence to guide a bright frontier


some things i believe:

  • at the level of civilisation
    • universe is hyper young, life on Earth an outlier
    • democratising intelligence will supercharge abundance and quality of life
    • sustained flourishing of life is a moral responsibility of intelligence
    • transformers will provide a stable and scalable paradigm for an early AGI by '28
  • the alignment problem defines the core behaviour of society
    • it is the triple point of "paleolithic emotions, medieval institutions and godlike technology"
    • in other words, longevity requires regeneration
  • lessons from economics:
    • EMH is weak at best, all opportunities emerge in the gaps of market rationality
    • the fate of billions is steered overwhelmingly by the work of a few
    • consolidations of market power are dangerous and wasteful, but optimal for investors
  • lessons from research:
    • ultimate promise of LLMs is agents, ultimate promise of agents is automatic science
    • moving to agent(s) improves prompting from "write me an essay" to "run my company" or "build me a dyson syphere"
    • pure technology is undesirable, as it regenerates faster than humans ever will
    • digital platforms maximise hyperstimuli and addiction, by choice or by nature. reels/tiktok are 0.5-d wireheading
    • with LLMs we tread closer to true natural abstraction - next stop: telepathy
  • some other thoughts:
    • innovation and agility thrive in small, focused groups working fast
    • progress is rate limited by our ability to ask more meaningful questions - moral philosophers make effective leaders
    • most people i know have a common thread that connects all the decisions in their life

deep enjoyer of The Fountainhead (ayn rand), painting, ex machina, and Jungle (band)
